SELECT cardID FROM ( -- (5) "Выданные мной поручения контрольные" -- SELECT c.card_id as cardID, date_trunc('day',term_av.date_value) as term_date, regnum_av.number_value as regnum FROM Card c INNER JOIN attribute_value avUser ON ( avUser.card_id = c.card_id -- (324) "Поручение": "Автор"/U ('JBR_INFD_SGNEX_LINK') and avUser.attribute_code ='JBR_INFD_SGNEX_LINK' and avUser.number_value in (%CURRENTUSERS%)) INNER JOIN attribute_value control ON ( control.card_id = c.card_id -- (324) "Поручение": "На контроле"/L ('JBR_TCON_ONCONT') and (control.attribute_code ='JBR_TCON_ONCONT') and control.value_id = 1450 ) LEFT JOIN attribute_value term_av ON (term_av.card_id = c.card_id and term_av.attribute_code = 'JBR_TCON_TERM') --JBR_MAINDOC LEFT JOIN attribute_value maindoc_av ON (maindoc_av.card_id = c.card_id and maindoc_av.attribute_code = 'JBR_MAINDOC') LEFT JOIN attribute_value regnum_av ON (regnum_av.card_id = maindoc_av.number_value and regnum_av.attribute_code = 'JBR_REGD_REGNUM_D') WHERE ( -- Шаблон=Поручение (324), состояние="Исполнение"(103) (c.template_id=324) and (c.status_id=103) ) -- /WHERE
UNION
-- Независимое поручение (1255), статус "Исполнение" (103), -- "Должность, ФИО лица, подписавшего документ"/C ('JBR_INFD_SGNEX_LINK') SELECT c.card_id as cardID, date_trunc('day',term_av.date_value) as term_date, regnum_av.number_value as regnum FROM card c JOIN attribute_value av ON (av.card_id = c.card_id AND av.attribute_code = 'JBR_INFD_SGNEX_LINK') AND av.number_value in (%CURRENTUSERS%) left JOIN attribute_value control ON ( control.card_id = c.card_id and control.attribute_code ='JBR_IMPL_ONCONT') LEFT JOIN attribute_value term_av ON (term_av.card_id = c.card_id and term_av.attribute_code = 'JBR_IMPL_DEADLINE') LEFT JOIN attribute_value regnum_av ON (regnum_av.card_id = c.card_id and regnum_av.attribute_code = 'JBR_REGD_REGNUM_D') WHERE c.template_id = 1255 AND c.status_id= 103 AND COALESCE(control.value_id,1433) = 1433
ORDER BY term_date, regnum
) AS a
